TopicTitle: Any way to get 1.7 revamped parts working in 1.6?

Articles.Content: Yeah. The parts look nice, and I'd love to have them, but I don't want to update because of the mods I have.

THEORETICALLY yes. But with restrictions. 

By copying the mesh, cfg and textures, you should be able to use the new parts on 1.6 as long these parts doesn't use any of the new internal features.

However, why they would code the new features if not for use them on the new parts? 

But it worths a try. Create a clean 1.6.1 install and copy the new parts into there and check them (remember to delete the old version of the parts).

just remember to use a clean copy, as things can get messy by human errors.

 

Edited April 11, 2019 by Lisias
